item.title: [US][Public cloud] - End of life for Kubernetes 1.19
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Dec 12, 08:00 - 16:00 UTC

Oct 6, 00:49 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 12/12/2022 08:00 UTC
End time : 12/12/2022 16:00 UTC
Service impact : No impact except for the apps that do not support the new version (1.20).
Service improvement: The aim of this maintenance is to upgrade deprecated clusters to a supported newer version (1.20).

item.title: [GRA/BHS][Public cloud] - End Of Life ML Serving
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 30, 12:00 UTC  -  Dec 1, 12:00 UTC

Aug 18, 09:51 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 16/08/2022 15:00 UTC
End time : 01/12/2022 08:00 UTC
Comment : As part of the product lifecycle management,
We will end the Sales of ML Serving services October 4th 2022 (no more new services).
We will end the Growth of existing ML Serving services December 1st 2022 (no more new namespaces or models deployed).
We will end the Support of all ML Serving services December 1st 2022 (shutdown of the services and related backups).

Impacted customers will be notified by email about this End-Of-Life process in August (email from NIC Admin)

Perimeter:
- All ML Serving services and solutions (free or paid) worldwide.
- OVHcloud /cloud/project/{serviceName}/ai/serving/* API endpoints

NOT in the perimeter:
- AI Notebooks
- AI Training
- AI Deploy (formerly AI Apps)

Workaround: customer will be contacted to migrate to new Public Cloud Databases AI Deploy.
Migration tutorials will be provided on https://docs.ovh.com/gb/en/publiccloud/ai/

Timeline:
04/10/2022 10h CEST : End of Sales
01/12/2022 10h CEST : End of Growth
01/12/2022 10h CEST : End of Support, Shutdown of all impacted services 10h CEST

We will update this task during the proposed timeline.

Aug 17, 14:10 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Aug 17, 14:09 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 16/08/2022 15:00 UTC
End time : 01/12/2022 08:00 UTC
Comment : As part of the product lifecycle management,
We will end the Sales of ML Serving services October 4th 2022 (no more new services).
We will end the Growth of existing ML Serving services December 1st 2022 (no more new namespaces or models deployed).
We will end the Support of all ML Serving services December 1st 2022 (shutdown of the services and related backups).

Impacted customers will be notified by email about this End-Of-Life process in August (email from NIC Admin)

Perimeter:
- All ML Serving services and solutions (free or paid) worldwide.
- OVHcloud /cloud/project/{serviceName}/ai/serving/* API endpoints

NOT in the perimeter:
- AI Notebooks
- AI Training
- AI Deploy (formerly AI Apps)

Workaround: customer will be contacted to migrate to new Public Cloud Databases AI Deploy.
Migration tutorials will be provided on https://docs.ovh.com/gb/en/publiccloud/ai/

Timeline:
04/10/2022 10h CEST : End of Sales
01/12/2022 10h CEST : End of Growth
01/12/2022 10h CEST : End of Support, Shutdown of all impacted services 10h CEST

We will update this task during the proposed timeline.

item.title: [GRA5/GRA7/GRA9/SBG5/WAW1/SGP1/BHS5/SYD1/UK1][Public cloud] - End of life for Kubernetes 1.19
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 8, 08:00 UTC  -  Nov 10, 16:00 UTC

Aug 22, 14:26 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 08/11/2022 08:00 UTC
End time : 10/11/2022 16:00 UTC
Service impact : No impact except for the apps that do not support the new version (1.20).
Service improvement: The aim of this maintenance is to upgrade deprecated clusters to a supported newer version (1.20).

item.title: [GRA][ManagedPrivateRegistry] - Registries operation
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Oct 27, 08:00 - 16:00 UTC

Oct 13, 22:20 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 27/10/2022 08:00 UTC
End time : 27/10/2022 16:00 UTC
Service impact : Docker images/Helm charts won't be able to be push during the operation.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we need to perform an operation on the registries.
The registries will be set in read-only mode during the operation. Pulling Docker images and Helm charts will be still possible during the operation. The operation can take up to 5mn.

item.title: [GRA5 | GRA7 | GRA9 | SBG5 | WAW1 | SGP1| BHS5 | VA1 | OR1 | SYD1 | UK1 | DE1][Containers & Orchestration] - Managed Kubernetes Service
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Oct 25, 08:00 - 15:00 UTC

Sep 15, 13:09 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 25/10/2022 11:00 UTC
End time : 25/10/2022 12:00 UTC
Service impact : OVHcloud Kubernetes API could be unavailable for few seconds
Service improvement : From OVHcloud Api, for NodePool resources, the RESIZING value of the "status" attribute will disappear and be replaced by more specific values (UPSCALING and DOWNSCALING, non-definitive naming) depending on whether the NodePool is requesting new nodes or deleting nodes.
For terraform users, an update of the plugin "terraform-provider-ovh" will be required.

item.title: [GRA][ManagedPrivateRegistry] - Registries migration
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Oct 20, 06:00 - 16:00 UTC

Oct 13, 22:20 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 20/10/2022 06:00 UTC
End time : 20/10/2022 16:00 UTC
Service impact : If there is a firewall that allow the registry based on IP and not DNS, it will need to be updated.
Please note that registry IP may change.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we need to migrate registries.

item.title: [GRA7][Compute] - API
item.description:
Oct 17, 10:27 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 17/10/2022 10:00 UTC
Service impact : OpenStack APIs fail to respond due to a database issue. Instances already running continue to function
Ongoing actions : Our teams investigate to determine the origin of the incident and correct it

item.title: [ALL][Public Cloud] Managed Kubernetes events deletion issues leading to increase in ETCD storage usage
item.description:
Oct 13, 10:18 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 13/10/2022 08:00 UTC
End Time : 13/10/2022 10:05 UTC
Root cause :Managed Kubernetes Service could reached their ETCD quota storage due to a change in our backend.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Oct 13, 09:47 UTC
Monitoring - Start time : 13/10/2022 08:00 UTC
Service impact : ETCD quota storage could be reached due to the stacking of Kubernetes events, resources management could be disrupted temporarily.
Root cause : Managed Kubernetes Service could reached their ETCD quota storage due to a change in our backend.
Ongoing actions : Analyze done. A patch is being released in all our production environments.

item.title: Glance upgrade
item.description:
Oct 13, 09:19 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Oct 13, 07:42 UTC
Scheduled - We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.
